channel.title: Posts on Faguo Cao
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Faguo Cao

item.title: ssh
item.description: -i 指定证书pem SSH问题集 Received disconnect from 172.19.34.89 port 22:2: Too many authentication failures for root Authentication failed. ssh或scp出现认证错误，可添加PubkeyAuthentication参数解决。 $ ssh -o PubkeyAuthentication=no root@host ssh翻墙上网 ssh -p 65199 -i ~/Documents/sshkeys/aws-seoul-key.pem ec2-user@52.79.104.178 -L 0.0.0.0:8080:0.0.0.0:8080 -N ** mac ssh** macOS Sierra 10.12.2 or later, you will need to modify your ~/.ssh/config file to automatically load keys into the ssh-agent and store passphrases in your keychain. Host * AddKeysToAgent yes UseKeychain yes IdentityFile ~/.

item.title: shell环境初始化
item.description: # User specific aliases and functions alias cp='cp -i' alias ln='ln -i' alias mv='mv -i' alias rm='rm -i --preserve-root' alias cpanm='cpanm --sudo --mirror http://mirrors.163.com/cpan --mirror-only' #/usr/sbin/ismtp # a quick way to get out of current directory alias ..='cd ..' alias ...='cd ../../../' alias ....='cd ../../../../' alias .....='cd ../../../../' # Colorize the grep command color alias grep='grep --color=auto' alias egrep='egrep --color=auto' alias fgrep='fgrep --color=auto' # handy short cuts alias h='history' alias j='jobs -l' # Stop after sending count ECHO_REQUEST packets alias ping='ping -c 5' # Do not wait interval 1 second, go fast # alias fastping='ping -c 100 -s.
